content.text:
[@kas](@RuNxm8SRujPcJx6GjtTQHp6hprAFv5voEkcvoAkB8Pk=.ed25519) 

I've had some bad bagels before, but the good ones are soft and doughy and savory with lots of seeds and seasonings. I like to toast them and add [vegan] cream cheese so they look something like this:

![Photo of an everything bagel with cream cheese on a plate](&vUEv/VYUqbX0zRMnBxKrh+km2mrNk/3m612E+AEnZ5E=.sha256)

(the bagel in the photo doesn't look toasted to me, but you can pretend)

mentions.name: Photo of an everything bagel with cream cheese on a plate
